actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that public debt as a share of gross domestic product should be stabilized at not more than 60 percent by 2018.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) public debt as a share of gross domestic product (GDP) should be stabilized up to 60% by 2018; and (2) annual deficits as a share of GDP should be reduced up to 3% by such year.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that public debt as a share of gross domestic product should be stabilized at not more than 60 percent by 2018.
